panels.description:
- Service Tag: $serverServiceTag
- Function: $func_server 
- IP address: $ip_address
- Management: $instance
- Location: $location_server.$rack.U$unit
panels.title: Health

targets.expr: (physicalDiskCapacityInMB{instance="$instance"}) + on (physicalDiskNumber) group_left(physicalDiskDisplayName) (physicalDiskDisplayName{instance="$instance"}) + on (physicalDiskNumber) group_left(physicalDiskProductID) (physicalDiskProductID{instance="$instance"})  + on (physicalDiskNumber) group_left(physicalDiskSerialNo) (physicalDiskSerialNo{instance="$instance"})
